title: 2 PCs Pencil Sharperner with Container Dual Holes (8mm, 12mm)- Handheld,Durable Pencil Sharpners,for Kids, Adults,School, Home and Office - Triangular
features: Multiple Sizes Accommodated: Designed with two holes of 8mm and 12mm, this sharpener is perfect for lead pencils, lip liners, crayons, and various other types. It's an ideal choice for round, triangular, and hexagonal pencils, offering convenient versatility.

Sharp and Pointed Tips: The pencil sharpener for kids features razor-sharp titanium-coated blades that resist rust. With just a twist of your wrist, these premium blades create a perfectly sharp and robust tip swiftly and effortlessly

Large Transparent Reservoir: Our pencil sharpener for adults includes a bigger barrel to catch all the wood shavings, keeping your workspace clean. The transparent surface lets you see when it’s full, making clean-up easy and mess-free.

Bright and Ergonomic Design: The pack contains two rectangular sharpeners in bright, attractive colors. These sharpeners are ergonomically designed to reduce strain on little fingers, making them perfect for colored pencils.

Ideal for Makeup Application: This lip liner sharpener and eyeliner sharpener provides smooth, sharp tips for all your cosmetic pencils. Perfect for precision, it works effortlessly with eyebrow pencil sharpeners and other makeup essentials, keeping your beauty tools in top condition.
